title: Women's Pro Sports Startup Looking to Grow
itunes:title: Women's Pro Sports Startup Looking to Grow
description:
Hosts Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Damian Sassower are joined by Jonathan Soros, co-founder of Athletes Unlimited, a growing network of professional sports leagues for women that recently gained $30 million in funding. Soros discusses how they're planning to serve athletes and fans that tend to be overlooked, and their unique model that gives athletes a voice.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
